description: Try our easy to follow Pasta with Chicken, Sausages, Spinach & Tomato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Low saturated fat,Sausage,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Tomato,Chicken,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Pasta with Chicken, Sausages, Spinach & Tomato Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch spinach, leaves removed, washed and shredded
4 tsp extra virgin olive oil (save 2 tbs to drizzle)

recipeInstructions.text: Place bread into a food processor and process until crumbs form.
Stir crumbs in a non-stick frying pan over a medium-low heat for 4 minutes or until golden. Add garlic and stir until well combined. Remove from heat and cool.
Heat oil in frying pan. Add sausages and cook for 8 minutes, turning often, until browned on all sides and cooked through.
Transfer to a plate and cover with foil.
When cool enough to handle, slice thinly.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling salted water until just tender. Add spinach and drain immediately.
Return to saucepan with sausage and tomatoes.
Serve immediately drizzled with oil and sprinkled with breadcrumbs.
